mapper.select: select b.build_id as BUILD_ID, b.build_type as BUILD_TYPE, b.build_code as BUILD_CODE, b.build_name as BUILD_NAME, d.dic_name as VILLAGE_ID, b.build_up_area as BUILT_UP_AREA, b.unit_num as UNIT_NUM, b.floor_num as FLOOR_NUM, b.bsflag as bsflag from oil_build_information b left join type_dic_conver d on b.village_id = d.source_type
